div.div:
AuthorizationPolicy
from:
Â Â Â namespaces:Â ["tenant-1"]
to:
Â hosts: ["*.tenant-1.svc.cluster.local"]
Â paths: ["/tenant-1/*"]

AuthorizationPolicy

Â Â Â namespaces:Â ["knative-eventing"]
when:

div.div:
AuthorizationPolicy
from:
Â Â Â namespaces:Â ["knative-eventing"]
when:
Â Â key:Â request.headers[Kn-Namespace]
Â Â values: ["tenant-1"]

div.div: Sender sends "Kn-Namespace" header with the resource's namespace as value, so that tenant's proxies can allow or deny the requests

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
